transform_def.name: unDisc
transform_def.string: let fr1 = floor(unit_rnd_0 * 3.0) fr2 = floor(unit_rnd_0 * 3.0) v1 = complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) v2 = complex(-p_in.x, p_in.y) v3 = complex(p_in.x, -p_in.y) v4 = complex(-p_in.x, -p_in.y) na0 = if(fr1 == 0.0, v1, if(fr1 == 1.0, v2, if(fr1 == 2.0, v3, v4))) na = square(na0.re / na0.re - na0.im / na0.im) * invpi() r = atan2(p_in.y, p_in.x) + fr2 * pi() in vec2(cos(r), sin(r)) / na
